articles.description: Ron Rivera said he wanted to make the Redskins more versatile this offseason, and when you actually put all of his additions next to each other, it's obvious that he followed through on that intention.

articles.title: Dubs' Dynasty Plot 2.0 - Bleacher Report
articles.description: Free agency and injuries have turned the Warriors' fortunes upside down, but with a potential No. 1 pick and the Splash Brothers on the way, Golden State may have all it needs to reboot its dynasty.
articles.content:
Even though the 2019-20 NBA season was essentially over before it began for the Golden State Warriors, how it ends could still have a major impact on the franchise and its hopes to resume its pursuit of championships in the years to come.
